newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Three Russian soldiers killed in blast accident.
newsitem.headline: Three Russian soldiers killed in blast accident.

text.p: Three Russian servicemen were killed and 12 wounded in an explosion on a training ground of the Volga military district on Friday, a Defence Ministry spokesman said.
The spokesman did not give any other details but Interfax news agency said the explosion happened in the dark when a military unit was heading for field exercises.
"Preliminary reports say that one of the soldiers accidentally stepped on a grenade," Interfax quoted a military source as saying.
